definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Pride like that makes Mensa an easy 2)target for critics.
sentences.chinese: 這種驕氣使得曼沙成爲批評者容易攻擊的靶子。
她的拒絕使他的驕氣大挫。
女性活得那麼驕氣十足。

sentences.english: The proud and arrogant man-"Mocker" is his name; he behaves with overweening pride.
sentences.chinese: 心驕氣傲的人，名叫褻慢，他行事狂妄，都出於驕傲。

sentences.english: In reality, there is, perhaps, no one of our natural passions so hard to subdue as pride.
sentences.chinese: 其實，我們自然情感中沒有一種像克服驕氣那麼難了。
